title: Schedule a Consultation
description: Are you interested in a holistic approach to primary care? We can help! Contact us today and experience the benefits of integrative medicine.
cleaned_text: Get more from your Primary Care at Whole Family Healthcare! Call our central scheduling line at 407-644-2990 to schedule your comprehensive Weaning| Are you interested in a holistic approach to primary care? We can help! Contact us today and experience the benefits of integrative medicine. "Love this place! I was sick and my regular doctors were unable to help me. I was suggested this route and glad I did. I begin feeling better within my 1st week of treatments ! The staff and doctors really make the place amazing ,comfortable & cozy to be here . They are helpful and full of knowledge for my many questions. Highly suggest checking it out!" "I have been seeing the team at Whole Family Healthcare for about six months now. From the first time I walked through the door everyone was a delight to interact with. From the front office team to the medical assistants and nurses to my doctor everyone is very professional and welcoming. One of the best health decisions I've made in some time." "I love the people at Whole Family Healthcare. Everyone I have worked with has been very kind and truly interested in my health. I strongly recommend seeking out their services." "Great place, facility was clean and everyone was welcoming. I saw Karen and she was so understanding and really listened to my concerns. I will be definitely recommending my friends and family here!" 407-644-2990 1201 Louisiana Ave. Ste. E. Winter Park, FL. 32789 Office Hours Monday 10:00 - 5:00 Tuesday 9:00 - 5:00 Wednesday 9:00 - 5:00 Thursday 9:00 - 5:00 Friday 9:00 - 2:00 407-833-6300 156 N. 4th Street, Suite 1480 Lake Mary, FL 32746 Office Hours Monday - 10:00 - 5:00 Tuesday 9:00 - 5:00 Wednesday 9:00 - 5:00 Thursday 9:00 - 5:00 Friday 9:30 - 2:00 We use cookies to analyze website traffic and optimize your website experience.
